content: A-GPB Abrasive sleeve Ultimate abrasive sleeves for rough to fine grinding of stainless steel, steel, aluminum and other metals ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Achieve satin finish, mirror finish or a defined surface roughness with our broad abrasive grade selection for rough to fine grinding Also available in coarse grain sizes for rougher grinding Non-woven sleeves engineered to reduce marks, smears and last longer Developed for best results with Hilti variable-speed abrasive tools for professional metalwork Applications Rough to fine grinding and polishing of stainless steel, steel, aluminum and other metals Obtaining linear medium and fine satin finishes on stainless steel, aluminum and other metals Polishing to a mirror finish on stainless steel, steel and other metals ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Ultimate Diameter: 100 mm Width: 3.9 in Technical Data | Product Class | Ultimate | Base material | Stainless steel, Steel ### ITEMS- 2243172 - Abrasive sleeve A-GPB 100 P80 SPX - Package Size 20 pc
